trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Belleville
There were no other sightings in Belleville on or around July 30th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsme and a friend where traveling down town hall road late at night 2am or so and noticed two bright lights hovering just over the treeline. as we got closer the lights got bigger. at first we thought wow those are ufos. we wereboth terriffed and drove right passed the objects we did not even look back when we got home we were so freaked out all we could do is laugh.we have only told a couple of people since then and we still cant believe it.wow.we will never be the same.
Summary: very bright round objects spotted hovering above ground over field off of townhall road in belleville il
